code: var decodeJWTPayload=function decodeJWTPayload(){var myJWT=localStorage.getItem('W2M-JWT-Token');var payloadB64;var payload;if(myJWT){payloadB64=myJWT.split('.')[1];payload=JSON.parse(decodeURIComponent(escape(window.atob(payloadB64))));}else payload={"id":"0000","name":"test","dataID":"0000","auth":false};return payload;};export default decodeJWTPayload;
